amendatorysection.para: Sections 79-254 to 79-294 shall be known and may be cited as the Student Discipline Act.

crossreference.para: Membership in secret school organization, grounds for denial of school privileges, see section 79-2,101 et seq.

annotation.para: School officials' statutory authority to conduct searches of students is implied by the Student Discipline Act. J.P. v. Millard Public Schools, 285 Neb. 890, 830 N.W.2d 453 (2013).
